title: The Venus in Libra Woman: Personality Traits, Dating, & What Makes Her Tick

steps.title: The Venus in Libra woman is charming and elegant.
steps.content: The Venus in Libra woman is charming and elegant. In astrology, the planet Venus represents art, love, beauty, aesthetics, and money. Venus is the ruler of Libra, which means when Venus is in Libra all those Libra traits will be that much stronger and more intense. Women born with Venus in Libra have a reputation for being fair and balanced as well as having a great sense of style. Element: air Modality : cardinal Keywords: calm, diplomatic, elegant, caring [1] X Research source Famous Venus in Libra women: Beyoncé, Emma Stone, Phoebe Bridgers, Amandla Stenberg

steps.title: Venus in Libra women are graceful, poised, and tactful.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women are graceful, poised, and tactful. She tends to have a classic, timeless sense of style and knows how to act appropriately in any situation. The typical Venus in Libra woman cares a great deal about how she comes across to others and wants to treat everyone with fairness and respect. While Venus primarily deals with love and relationships, it often impacts other aspects of someone's personality as well. For the Venus in Libra woman, this comes across in her style and how she communicates with others. She also has a reputation for being relatively cool under pressure. Her unflappable grace and poise in even the most difficult situations leads people around her to look up to her and seek her out for advice. Negative traits: She can be needy, a bit indecisive, and has a tendency to start drama so she can swoop in and play peacemaker.

steps.title: For a Venus in Libra woman, break out the old-school courtship.
steps.content: For a Venus in Libra woman, break out the old-school courtship. The Venus in Libra lady has the heart of a true romantic and is looking for someone to sweep her off of her feet. She's pretty traditional when it comes to dating and expects to be wooed. Venus in Libra women also tend to enjoy parties and group outings where they can be social, so a double date or night out with a group of friends can be a great way to get to know each other.

steps.title: The typical Venus in Libra woman wants a committed relationship.
steps.content: The typical Venus in Libra woman wants a committed relationship. A Venus in Libra lady thrives in a romantic relationship and feels her best when she has a dedicated and loyal partner by her side. She's not one for casual flings and will likely lose interest in you if you're not ready to commit on her timetable. The flip side of this is that she can sometimes come across as clingy and dependent. Set boundaries early so she knows what you're comfortable with and what crosses the line. Venus in Libra ladies are social butterflies who typically have a lot of friends, so don't be surprised if she's constantly introducing you to people in her social circle.

steps.title: Venus in Libra women may jump into a relationship quickly.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women may jump into a relationship quickly. This isn't their fault! They tend to be so caught up in the fantasy of a romance that they'll rush things in the beginning. But they'll also make their dates feel pretty special, which can make for a memorable relationship. The typical Venus in Libra woman is definitely a people-pleaser, and this holds true for her romantic partner in particular. She'll bend over backward to make sure you're happy with her and that she's doing everything she can for you.

steps.title: A Venus in Libra woman can get caught up in romance.
steps.content: A Venus in Libra woman can get caught up in romance. Romance is not just a dreamy fantasy for the typical Venus in Libra woman—it's a life goal. She believes that falling in love is the best and she wants everything about her blossoming love to be beautiful, light, and easy. As a charming and fashionable woman, Venus in Libra always wants your little romantic moments to be picture-perfect. Don't be surprised if she chronicles your dates on social media to capture all those sweet moments for posterity.

steps.title: Venus in Libra women care about fulfilling their partner's needs.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women care about fulfilling their partner's needs. When a Venus in Libra woman is in love, she focuses a lot of her attention on that relationship because she wants it to be the best it can be. She's very sensitive to her partner's needs and will do everything in her power to make sure they're happy. Fortunately for the typical Venus in Libra woman, she has no problem adapting to fit what her partner is looking for in an ideal lover. This can be a double-edged sword, though, since she also has the tendency to lose herself in relationships.

steps.title: A woman born with Venus in Libra is affectionate and attentive.
steps.content: A woman born with Venus in Libra is affectionate and attentive. When a Venus in Libra woman commits to someone, she commits to them heart and soul. She may seem as though she worships the ground you walk on, but keep in mind that she wants you to worship her too. In love, the Venus in Libra woman is loyal and companionable. She truly enjoys spending time with her partner and will do whatever she can to make every experience memorable and enjoyable.

steps.title: A Venus in Libra woman is more about romance than sex.
steps.content: A Venus in Libra woman is more about romance than sex. Venus in Libra women don't tend to focus on sex very much—it's just not as important to them as the other lovey-dovey stuff. She loves holding hands and kissing but can be a little stiff when it comes to doing the deed. Venus in Libra ladies often put a lot of time and effort into their looks, which can also make them a bit shy in the bedroom—they might be afraid to do anything that would mess up their perfectly styled hair and makeup. If sex is important to you in a relationship, let her know. A Venus in Libra woman wants to please you and make you happy, so she'll usually be willing to play a bit more if it's a big deal for you.

steps.title: Venus in Libra women typically know how to set a romantic scene.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women typically know how to set a romantic scene. When a Venus in Libra woman gets ready for a sensual night, she's going to make sure the satin sheets are on the bed and there's some steamy music playing at a low volume. She'll probably light some candles and might even scatter rose petals around the bed. Aesthetics are pretty important to a Venus in Libra woman, so this process of setting the scene is a bigger deal to her than she might let on. Creating the perfect romantic environment is how she gets into the mood.

steps.title: Venus in Libra women have a reputation for unlocking others' passion.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women have a reputation for unlocking others' passion. She might not be the most sexually motivated person herself, but a Venus in Libra woman's beauty inspires passion in her partner. She has a way of making her partner feel as though they are part of something very intimate, a fantasy created just for them. The planet Venus is more about love than sex and passion for the Venus in Libra woman is typically more sensual than carnal.

steps.title: Venus in Libra women often thrive in relationships.
steps.content: Venus in Libra women often thrive in relationships. Venus is the planet of love and relationships and Libra is ruled by Venus. For women born with Venus in Libra, this means being in a relationship will likely be their ultimate goal. They tend to get pretty down when they're single and try not to stay single for long. The Venus in Libra woman can have a hard time understanding why anyone would value being single. She likely also tries to set up her single friends, believing everyone would be better off in a relationship than on their own.

steps.title: She tends to lose herself in a relationship.
steps.content: She tends to lose herself in a relationship. For the typical Venus in Libra woman, life fulfillment comes from being in a romantic relationship. She might even feel somewhat lost when she's un-partnered. Because of this, she gives everything she has to a relationship. She often puts her partner's needs and even wants before her own, which means she can potentially lose sight of who she is as an individual. Venus in Libra women often believe that partners in a relationship should merge their identities to some extent. They buy into the idea that two become one wholeheartedly.

steps.title: She can come off as clingy or dependent.
steps.content: She can come off as clingy or dependent. Because the Venus in Libra woman believes that being in a relationship is what gives her life meaning, she can have some insecurity about her partner. That insecurity can lead her to insist that her partner needs to do everything with her. At the same time, she's so agreeable and companionable that her partner will likely enjoy spending so much time with her. Someone who needs their freedom would likely have a hard time being in a relationship with a Venus in Libra woman. She could get suspicious and upset if her partner frequently wanted to do things on their own.

steps.title: A Venus in Libra tends to work best with other air signs.
steps.content: A Venus in Libra tends to work best with other air signs. If her Venus is in Libra, she'll typically find that she has a similar style of loving as those who also have Venus in an air sign (Libra, Gemini , or Aquarius). She tends to have great communication with Venus in Gemini folks and loves sharing ideas with Venus in Aquarius people. [2] X Research source A Venus in Libra woman is known for her diplomatic nature and she's great at finding a compromise that will suit both herself and her partner. Other air signs tend to appreciate this quality and love that she takes their needs and wants into consideration.

steps.title: Venus in Libra ladies have the most challenges with water signs.
steps.content: Venus in Libra ladies have the most challenges with water signs. If your Venus is in a water sign ( Cancer , Scorpio , Pisces ), you likely have a lot of work ahead of you if you want a happy relationship with a woman who has her Venus in Libra. The main issue here is just that the two of you have very different love styles, which means you can have a hard time understanding each other. Water signs tend to get caught up in their emotions and Libra is more intellectual. All of those feelings might get a little too intense for a Venus in Libra lady.

steps.title: Treat everyone kindly and fairly.
steps.content: Treat everyone kindly and fairly. A Venus in Libra lady will be sure to notice how you treat other people—and she'll be looking for you to treat everyone around you with respect, regardless of their position. If she sees that you tip well and are kind to everyone you meet, you'll be more likely to catch her eye. [3] X Research source The placement of Venus in your chart can tell you what someone values. If her Venus is in Libra, that means she values equality and justice and wants to be with someone who values these things as well. Because she values equality so highly, she tends to be totally turned off by anyone who comes across as arrogant or snobby.

steps.title: Watch your manners.
steps.content: Watch your manners. The social and stylish Venus in Libra woman really cares how she comes across to others. She's known for her grace and poise and wants to be with someone who's polite and knows how to behave properly in public. If you want to capture her heart, she needs to know that you'll make her look good when she's on your arm. When in doubt, err on the side of formality. A Venus in Libra lady could be put off if she feels that you're acting too casually or too familiarly—especially if she hasn't yet gotten to know you very well.

steps.title: Put effort into your grooming and personal style.
steps.content: Put effort into your grooming and personal style. Venus in Libra women are known for their style and exceptional taste. She never leaves the house looking less than flawless and she wants a partner who looks just as great by her side. While this doesn't necessarily mean that you have to break out the designer duds, you do want to make sure that your clothing fits well and is always clean and pressed. Even on a casual night in, you'll impress a Venus in Libra woman by stepping it up a notch—say, a matching tracksuit rather than a pair of baggy sweatpants and a mismatched T-shirt.
